title: Ramsey Orta Jailed for Filming Eric Garner’s Death
subtitle: Ramsey Orta was sentenced to four years in prison in October 2016, but the charges were not specifically related to his having filmed Eric Garner's officer-involved death.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Ramsey Orta went to jail for filming the fatal encounter between Eric Garner and New York City police officers.
